attributes.action: Award a Damehood to Jane Tomlinson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jane Tomlinson is a terminally ill mother who, over recent years, has raised substantial amounts of money for charity through her long distance cycling (John O'Groats-Lands End, USA Coats to Coast).

If we can award Damehoods to athletes who win a couple of Olympic races, surely we can do so in this case?
